title: DoktorABC website & funnel review – Improvement ideas
key_objectives: Prioritize funnel optimizations: Consolidate all CRO and funnel improvement tasks into a clear roadmap
Pricing transparency on the invoice: Confirm whether invoices display full price breakdown (medication, service/consultation fee, shipping)
Treatment selection page clarity: Find clearer solution to ensure customers understand monthly treatment plan. Issue tied to >15% of cancellations in CS.
CRM / Coupon Code Logic: Expand coupon functionality so promo codes can be applied to service fees and delivery fees, not only product price

homepage_improvements.requirement: Add a 'Back to Top' scroll icon for easier navigation on long pages (apply to desktop & mobile)
Doctors' section enhancement: Add field of practice/specialization and years of experience for each doctor to build trust and transparency

category_page_improvements.requirement: Update displayed pricing for ED category: reflect current service fee and minimum medication price, instead of outdated. Include explanatory note that prices include tax and service fees for transparency.
Add reassurance bullet point: 'You pay nothing if the prescription is not issued' to build trust
Update the delivery/service bullet text to 'Fast delivery and discreet service' (replacing the old phrasing)
Implement a floating CTA button (e.g. 'Start Consultation') on category listing pages for mobile users once they scroll, to keep the call-to-action visible
Add a 'Quick Reorder' CTA for returning customers on category pages (e.g. 'Schnell nachbestellen' button) to shorten the repeat purchase flow

product_page_improvements.requirement: Remove the 'Free delivery' label/promo on product pages (no longer applicable)
Fix pricing display bug: ensure the product page shows the correct up-to-date price at all times (currently not updating properly)
Fix stock status logic: resolve the bug where products in stock are incorrectly shown as 'not in stock' on the product page

start_consultation_improvements.requirement: Update the informational pop-up content (triggered by the 'About our doctors/pharmacies' link) with current and accurate information

search_results_improvements.requirement: Implement search suggestions/autocomplete showing top searches or popular categories when a user engages the search bar (to educate and ease navigation)

Improve the search results page layout to show more products above the fold: reduce unnecessary header space and simplify product cards so that more items are immediately visible on desktop and mobile
Handle 'no results' cases by displaying a section of best-selling or popular products (with a 'Most popular' heading) instead of an empty results page

treatment_selection_improvements.requirement: Unify design of tablet/package selection across all drugs (Germany vs. non-Germany manufactured). Add clear emphasis if a drug is manufactured outside Germany.
Fix pricing bug: ensure drug price and tablet quantity selection show consistent, correct pricing (currently misaligned)
Reconsider pricing display: explore options for clearer breakdown (drug + service + shipping). Ensure regulatory compliance.
Add clear monthly plan indicator: explicitly show the user that they are choosing a recurring monthly treatment plan and what it includes

checkout_improvements.requirement: Show full price breakdown of OTC product in the order summary: list every OTC product cost
Add a 'risk-free' message near the price/CTA to reassure users (e.g. 'You'll only be charged if the doctor approves your prescription. If not, you won't be charged.')
A/B Test: Change the CTA text on the shipping page from 'Confirm and Pay' to a softer 'Proceed to Checkout', and add subtext '(you won't be charged yet)' below it
Reposition the coupon code field closer to the order total summary section for better visibility
Refine payment step UI: do not auto-expand the credit card input by default, and consider displaying the most relevant payment method first based on product category or country

my_account_improvements.requirement: Fix the order details view bug where an extra €29.00 service fee line is shown, so that the order total displayed to the user is correct (remove the duplicate fee entry)

marketing_crm_tasks.requirement: Audit and update all ad copies, landing pages, and on-site pop-ups to remove or correct any 'Free delivery' or outdated fee messaging
Update automated email templates and CRM campaigns to reflect the new fee policy – replace 'Free consultation fee' with '50% off consultation fee' in all communications
Refresh the Trustpilot rating image in the customer feedback pop-up (use the updated branding/asset)
